class.name: reflex_control/ModelExampleController
class.description: A controller that evaluates and prints the dynamic model of Franka

class.name: reflex_control/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure and an interactive marker respectively.

class.name: reflex_control/CartesianImpedanceControllerCropped
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure.
